actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To amend title VII of the Tariff Act of 1930 with respect to determining certain antidumping calculations for merchandise from former nonmarket economy countries.

summary.text: Market-Based Antidumping Calculations Act - Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to set forth special valuation rules for former nonmarket economy countries. Prescribes guidelines for the treatment of prices or costs distorted by nonmarket forces. Requires the administering authority to determine that prices or costs of a good or service are not determined by market-based forces of demand and supply if specified factors are present.

titles.title: To amend title VII of the Tariff Act of 1930 with respect to determining certain antidumping calculations for merchandise from former nonmarket economy countries.
